Merge pull request #1328 from crankycoder/features/1162-android-sdk-setup

Android SDK automatic installation support added

Merge pull request #1337 from cascheberg/fix

Update Gradle to version 1.0.0
Removed convergence code as accelerometers are much more imprecise than the docs suggest.

This commit renames the DetectUnchangingLocation class to LocationChangeSensor.
* A subsequent commit will push the LegacyMotionSensor and significant motion detector code behind a common interface.

A ServiceLocator has been added to MainApp so that we can inject dependencies at runtime to aid in testing and decoupling interfaces.

Preliminary documentation is provided in docs/testing.md
use different application ID for debug builds

@cascheberg's PR 1287 for metrics on nitification plus my changes for compactness of the
notification.
The german translation is not changed in this commit -sorry @caschberg!,
I know you made some changes to this translation, but my changes will
require re-doing this.
